sources.title: Adventure in Iraq (1943)
sources.description: Five Allied soldiers in an airplane flying to Egypt crash-land in Iraq. They are taken in by a local sheik, but soon begin to suspect that he may not be quite as friendly as he appears to be. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/adventure-in-iraq-1943/

sources.title: Adventure in Iraq (1943) WORLD WAR II
sources.description:
Director: D. Ross Lederman
Stars: John Loder, Ruth Ford, Warren Douglas 

After five Allied soldiers crash-land in Iraq, they are aided by a local sheik, but begin to suspect he may not be quite as friendly as he appears.

sources.title: Adventure In Iraq ( 1943) WORLD WAR II
sources.description: A sheik holds a downed pilot (Warren Douglas) and a couple (John Loder, Ruth Ford) in exchange for his brothers held as Nazi spies.

metadata.Plot: Five Allied soldiers in an airplane flying to Egypt crash-land in Iraq. They are taken in by a local sheik, but soon begin to suspect that he may not be quite as friendly as he appears to be.
metadata.Writer: George Bilson, Robert E. Kent, William Archer
metadata.Actors: John Loder, Ruth Ford, Warren Douglas
